Topic: Illustrate plants with and without water and light.
Evidence Statements: The student can show in their drawing that plants need water to live and grow.
The student can show in their drawing that plants need light to live and grow.
The student can illustrate what happens to a plant that does not have water.
The student can illustrate what happens to a plant that does not have light.
The student can identify patterns in their drawing, showing plants with both water and light are healthy.
